about_the_game:
Srok Godnosti is an atmospheric adventure game set in the post-USSR setting. In the role of a district police officer, you will have to serve in a small town lost in time. The fate and lives of city residents will depend on your actions.

The game takes place in a small, but open for exploration world, the riddle of which you have to solve, playing the role of a precinct, solving puzzles and responding to the requests of citizens.

  • Stylish retro graphics
  • The oppressive atmosphere of a city lost in time
  • Freedom to explore the world
  • Variation of the passage and endings

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of alcohol, smoking, violence, and nudity.
